text:
RepoPulse forecast (7-day breakout watchlist)

Method: reproducible baseline model using public GitHub signals (no LLM).
Breakout = +max(200 stars, +50%) within 7 days.

1) affaan-m/everything-claude-code | 98% | stars now 29715 → est 64360 (range 64268-64452)
   https://github.com/affaan-m/everything-claude-code
2) different-ai/openwork | 95% | stars now 7314 → est 13019 (range 12971-13067)
   https://github.com/different-ai/openwork
3) QwenLM/Qwen3-TTS | 95% | stars now 4587 → est 13247 (range 13217-13277)
   https://github.com/QwenLM/Qwen3-TTS
4) vercel-labs/json-render | 95% | stars now 9184 → est 16747 (range 16686-16808)
   https://github.com/vercel-labs/json-render
5) github/copilot-sdk | 94% | stars now 5636 → est 10000 (range 9958-10042)
   https://github.com/github/copilot-sdk

Daily forecasts are logged publicly, then scored 7 days later (hits, misses, calibration).
#opensource #software #datascience #forecasting #github
